name: ALOP - A lot of players [Multiplayer ONLINE]
name_original: ALOP - A lot of players [Multiplayer ONLINE]
description:
New HTML5 Version!

Due to protocol restriction (the game works online), the link is hosted on our website.

http://bit.ly/AloPHTML

Loading is pretty slow and we hope we will shrink the size in the following days!

We also changed how lobby works so that you will also find more open games.

Control ASD + E for jumping or any controller and square for jumping.

Stomp on your opponent's player.

If you run out of players, you will get half of the player of the current game leader!

Standard multiplayer is for debugging only!

To play online you need just a username. After you play "Host game" you will se your username and you can share it with your friends.

You will be the only one knowing that you won because there is no win screen nor restart option!
